title: Sports Business Writing - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sports Business Writing Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: To accommodate our growth we are seeking qualified sports journalists for ongoing contributions. Articles include trends pieces, facility reviews, native advertising (client) features...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
